eventDiscovery.title: Event Discovery
eventDiscovery.description: Find amazing events across Iraq and Kurdistan with our advanced search and filtering system.

easyEventCreation.title: Easy Event Creation
easyEventCreation.description: Create and manage your events with our intuitive event management platform.

multiLanguageSupport.title: Multi-Language Support
multiLanguageSupport.description: Navigate in Arabic, English, or Sorani Kurdish to make the platform accessible to everyone.

mobileFriendly.title: Mobile Friendly
mobileFriendly.description: Access events and create your own from anywhere with our fully responsive design.

flexibleTicketing.title: Flexible Ticketing
flexibleTicketing.description: Support for both free and paid events with secure payment processing.

communityFocused.title: Community Focused
communityFocused.description: Connect with event organizers and attendees to build stronger communities.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.p1: We believe that events have the power to bring people together, create lasting memories, and strengthen communities. Our mission is to make event discovery and creation accessible to everyone across Iraq and Kurdistan.
mission.p2: Whether you're looking for cultural festivals, business conferences, music concerts, or community gatherings, IraqEvents is your gateway to discovering what's happening in your city.
mission.p3: For event organizers, we provide powerful tools to create, promote, and manage events with ease, helping you reach the right audience and create successful experiences.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose IraqEvents?
whyChoose.subtitle: We've built the most comprehensive event platform for Iraq and Kurdistan, designed with our local communities in mind.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: We're a passionate team dedicated to bringing people together through events and building stronger communities across Iraq and Kurdistan.

devTeam.name: Development Team
devTeam.description: Building the future of event management in Iraq

communityTeam.name: Community Team
communityTeam.description: Helping users create and discover amazing events

localPartners.name: Local Partners
localPartners.description: Expanding our reach across Iraq and Kurdistan

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: These principles guide everything we do as we work to build the best event platform for our region.

communityFirst.title: Community First
communityFirst.description: We prioritize the needs of our local communities and event organizers.

trustSafety.title: Trust & Safety
trustSafety.description: We ensure secure transactions and protect user privacy at all times.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for the highest quality in everything we build and deliver.

culturalDiversity.title: Cultural Diversity
culturalDiversity.description: We celebrate and support the rich cultural diversity of our region.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously innovate to provide better solutions for event management.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: We make our platform accessible to everyone, regardless of technical expertise.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of event organizers and attendees who trust IraqEvents to bring their communities together.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Have questions or suggestions? We'd love to hear from you!

categoriesPage.title: Event Categories
categoriesPage.subtitle: Discover amazing events across all categories. From music and technology to food and culture, find exactly what interests you.
categoriesPage.ctaSubtitle: Create your own event and start building your community today!

categoryDescriptions.all: Discover all types of events happening around you
categoryDescriptions.musicConcerts: Live music, concerts, and musical performances
categoryDescriptions.sportsFitness: Sports events, fitness classes, and athletic competitions
categoryDescriptions.foodDrink: Culinary events, food festivals, and dining experiences
